title: How many text messages can be saved on my phone?
answer: If Delete old messages is turned on, your phone stores a maximum of 200 text messages or 20 multimedia messages per conversation by default. You can change these upper limits, whose values range from 10 to 5,000. On the Messaging screen, touch ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109323) then Settings, select Delete old messages. Then you can set the upper limits for text messages and multimedia messages. ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109324)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109325) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109326)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109327) ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109328) [[How many text or multimedia messages can be saved to your phone depends on your phone's available storage space.]()]()
